about_the_game:
"Boom Blast"


“These monsters captured the airship and took it high above the mountains. We need to bring him back!”

An exciting single-level platformer - "Boom Blast" from indie developer "LazeHammy"! In this exciting game, your mission is to save your airship. However, various enemies and obstacles will stand in your way.

What to do? You have a secret weapon - bombs! Blast them to destroy all your enemies and overcome obstacles. Not only will you save yourself, but you will also move towards victory.

Game Features

Exciting platformer in a cartoon style.

Use bombs to destroy enemies and obstacles.

Great graphics and sound effects.

Simple controls.


Join the adventure in "Boom Blast", set the time record!

Let's get our airship back!

This is my first project which is developed out of pure passion, sincerity and possibility =) I express my gratitude to you for visiting the store and supporting my project. From time to time I will update the game to add new content and fix bugs and shortcomings. In addition, I have good news, the concept of a new project is in development - an animated horror, which you will learn about soon =)
All the best!
detailed_description:
"Boom Blast"


“These monsters captured the airship and took it high above the mountains. We need to bring him back!”

An exciting single-level platformer - "Boom Blast" from indie developer "LazeHammy"! In this exciting game, your mission is to save your airship. However, various enemies and obstacles will stand in your way.

What to do? You have a secret weapon - bombs! Blast them to destroy all your enemies and overcome obstacles. Not only will you save yourself, but you will also move towards victory.

Game Features

Exciting platformer in a cartoon style.

Use bombs to destroy enemies and obstacles.

Great graphics and sound effects.

Simple controls.


Join the adventure in "Boom Blast", set the time record!

Let's get our airship back!

This is my first project which is developed out of pure passion, sincerity and possibility =) I express my gratitude to you for visiting the store and supporting my project. From time to time I will update the game to add new content and fix bugs and shortcomings. In addition, I have good news, the concept of a new project is in development - an animated horror, which you will learn about soon =)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E7400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Boom Blast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: Join BoomBlast to rescue a hijacked airship. Discover a new SPEEDRUN with simple and exciting mechanics, defeat all enemies and get your airship back.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
